Posts.Content: I read your story with interest. My mother had colon cancer 2-1/2 years ago, which was eliminated through surgery and chemo. Now she has liver cancer. which the doctor says they can prevent from spreading but cannot cure (similar to your words). I'm not familiar with herceptin. What is it and how fast did it work to clear your liver? Any other dietary/supplement suggestions for eliminating the liver cancer?
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastasi to The Liver
